int getStartedProcsFromGappman ( int  portno,
const char *  hostname,
struct proceslist **  startedprocs 
)

Connects to gappman and requests the proceslist.

Parameters:
portno portnumber gappman listens to
hostname servername of host that runs gappman
startedprocs adres of the pointer to a proceslist structure (call by reference)
Returns:
integer value 0: OK 1: Could not resolve hostname 2: Could not connect 3: Could not send message 4: Could not shutdown channel/disconnect
